bibl.title: Uniformis Trinitas: Once More the Theopaschite Trinitarianism of Dioscorus of Aphrodito.
bibl.note: Μονοειδής in the poetry of Dioscorus. - 1. The expression. - 2. The background. - 3. An echo from the capital (and its aftermath). - 4. Conclusion.
